shopifyCollection.title: Pennants
shopifyCollection.description: The classic silhouette. Our original, collaboration and vintage-inspired designs in traditional pennant form.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: The classic silhouette. Our original, collaboration and vintage-inspired designs in traditional pennant form.

products.title: Add A Frame to your Oxford Pennant
products.description: Add a frame to your 9"x27" pennant or vintage pennant! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. Final dimension: 12"x34" (for 9"x27", vintage may vary) Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the pennant is in-stock. Price includes UPS ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale. * We also offer framing options for our camp flags!
products.descriptionHtml:
Add a frame to your 9"x27" pennant or vintage pennant! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. 

Final dimension: 12"x34" (for 9"x27", vintage may vary) 

Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the pennant is in-stock.

Price includes UPS ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale.

* We also offer framing options for our camp flags!

products.title: Happy Birthday Bunting
products.description: Forget the disposable decor that only lasts for one party and string this baby up for every birthday until you're 100 (or older)! Our colorful bunting is easy to store or leave it up all year because it looks cool and you deserve to be celebrated. Size: 38 inches long; pennants: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt with screen-printed artwork Color: Crimson, Maroon, Old Gold, Forest, Turquoise, and Navy bodies; Cream details
